file_content.text: Hello. Unauthorized access to this control room is forbidden. Please wait calmly until security personnel arrive.
Vault stasis fields are fully powered and operational.
Emergency power is engaged with stasis fields at full strength. Probability of prisoner release is approaching zero.
Please note--emergency power is temporary. The chief engineer must institute a permanent solution before emergency power expires.
Projected expiration--approximately two hundred ninety-six years. Emergency defense supplies are being provided just in case. Thank you.
Emergency power is nearing required levels. Projection--final relay will provide adequate emergency power.
First relay is active and functional. Please continue engaging emergency relays.
Power levels are nearing failure. Full-scale prisoner release is imminent.
Stasis field power is nearing failure. Please engage emergency power relays immediately.
Systems initializing... unidentified user, alien species. Updating cultural interface.
Priority interrupt--disregard previous warning. Please inform the chief engineer that the stasis field generators have sustained damage. Critical power loss is imminent.
That explosion was close, yet you sound unconcerned.
Shouldn't you sound worried?
I find your nonchalant tone disturbing.
Shouldn't you sound worried?
Pretty cheerful tone for a sitrep like that.
Shouldn't you sound worried?
You always this cheerful when stuff blows up?
You don't sound worried.
Prison experiments show that inferior species are most manageable when addressed in a pleasant manner. Power levels are now near failure.
Report!
There are no Rakata left, engineers or otherwise.
You're out of touch, computer.
Please find any available personnel to substitute for chief engineer. Inaction would be unwise.
Stasis failure will cause affected vaults to open. Projection--catastrophic release of Esh-kha population and critical levels of planet-wide violence.
To avoid Esh-kha release, all emergency power relays must be manually engaged at vault conduit junctions.
We must keep those prisoners contained.
Consider it done.
The Esh-kha cannot be allowed to escape.
Consider it done.
Those prisoners aren't going anywhere.
Consider it done.
I can throw a few switches. Piece of cake.
Consider it done.
Yeah, yeah....
While your tone is inappropriate, your cooperation is appreciated. Please note--updated security scans indicate the damage was caused by Esh-kha saboteurs.
This better be worth it.
Historical data suggest prisoner escape often results in widespread violence, including death.
Your cooperation is appreciated. Please note--updated security scans indicate the damage was caused by Esh-kha saboteurs.
Suspected saboteurs are advancing toward several emergency relays. Anticipate combat scenarios.
Systems initializing... failed. Please try again later.
